attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2013-1239

Date: 2013-11-07

 Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que Lyle W. Zuk, de la ville de Prince Albert dans la province de la Saskatchewan, l’un des conseillers juridiques de Sa Majesté, soit nommé juge de la Cour du Banc de la Reine de la Saskatchewan.


 The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advises that Lyle W. Zuk, of the City of Prince Albert in the Province of Saskatchewan, one of Her Majesty’s counsel learned in the law, be appointed a Judge of Her Majesty's Court of Queen's Bench for Saskatchewan.
